tests.title: should validate user 1 has correct name: Leanne Graham
tests.fullTitle: Data-Driven Testing Example should validate user 1 has correct name: Leanne Graham
tests.code:
const response = await src_1.restified
    .given()
    .baseURL('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com')
    .when()
    .get(`/users/${id}`)
    .execute();
await response
    .statusCode(200)
    .jsonPath('$.id', id)
    .jsonPath('$.name', expectedName)
    .execute();

tests.title: should validate user object against JSON schema using global client
tests.fullTitle: Schema Validation Example should validate user object against JSON schema using global client
tests.code:
test_utils_1.GlobalTestUtils.logTestProgress('Schema Validation', 'User Object Validation');
const response = await src_1.restified
    .given()
    .useClient('api') // Pre-configured global client
    .when()
    .get('/users/{{globalUserId}}') // Use global user ID
    .execute();
await response
    .statusCode(200)
    .jsonSchema(userSchema)
    .jsonPath('$.name')
    .jsonPath('$.email')
    .execute();
